sourcesContent: import r from"react";import{translate as e}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{View as i}from"../../../primitives/View/View.js";import{Text as t}from"../../../primitives/Text/Text.js";const o=({errors:o,id:m})=>(null==o?void 0:o.length)>0?r.createElement(i,{"data-amplify-sign-up-errors":!0,id:m},o.map((i=>r.createElement(t,{key:i,role:"alert",variation:"error"},e(i))))):null;export{o as ValidationErrors};
